name: somi-gas-template
description: Start Template for Developing in Google Apps Scripts

scripts.setup:
mkdir -p dist && cd dist && read -p "Enter a Title for your Project:
" titleName && clasp create --title  "$titleName" && mv .clasp.json .. && cd ..
scripts.build: find dist/* -type f ! -name '*.json' -delete && cp $(find src -name '*.js' -o -name '*.html') dist
scripts.gpub: npm run build && npm run upload
scripts.commit-a:
git add . && git status && read -p "Commit Message-Title: 
" commitTitle && read -p "Commit Message-Desc: 
" commitDesc && git commit -m "$commitTitle" -m "$commitDesc"
scripts.gdeploy:
npm run gpub && read -p "Enter a Title for your Version:
" titleName && clasp deploy -i "AKfycbwYvS2nxnwQ93hCP4XC9YFPOqOMIK_fva3z7uv32AOWcVmzOCvoF3U4RZEkB7Fuv0vx" -d "$titleName"
